articles.title: Andre Iguodala is set for his Warriors return: 'Now is the time you need to crank it up' - The Athletic
articles.description: 'He's just Andre Iguodala, Finals MVP and a guy who has been so valuable to this franchise,' says Klay Thompson of Iguodala's return.
